entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 9:44 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:44 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
